question: My husband 2 children and I live in a rented flat.We are looking to buy a house of our own but can't seem to find anything that meets our needs.Please give me a du'aa to read.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
May Allah make it easy for you to find a suitable home. Make istighfaar regularly i.e. Say Astagfirullah, as Allah opens a way out for those who practice Istighfaar regularly.
You could also make the following dua: Allahummagh Firli Zhambee Wa wassi?li fee Daaree wa Baariklee fee Rizqhee.

Always turn to Allah in dua for your needs, with firm conviction that Allah will answer your duas at the most suitable time.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Hussein Kadodia
FATWA DEPT.

CHECKED & APPROVED: Ml. Imraan Vawda
